column1: Specifications: "Smart electric vehicle charging station designed for organizations."
Media content playback for digital signage applications
Access control with QR code scanning and UniFi Identity mobile app
Hardwire or use one of the included NEMA 14-50 and 6-50 cables for plug-in installation
Connected with UniFi WiFi Auto-Link* or Ethernet
*UniFi WiFi Auto-Link supported with version 1.0.262 and later. Third-party WiFi configuration is not supported."
"Weight": "With wall mount/charging gun/power cord: 8.1 kg (17.9 lb)"
"Connectivity": "(1) GbE RJ45 port\n(1) 2 pin ATX connector\nBluetooth® 4.2"
"Ambient operating temperature": "-40 to 50° C (-40 to 122° F)"
"Management application": "UniFi Connect web: Version 0.70 and laterUniFi Connect iOS™ and Android™"
